title: Solitaire Adventure - Elite v1.0.1
description:
Solitaire Adventure - The Resurrection of Faneruel is a distinctive Tri-Peaks like solitaire game with numerous levels and hours of game play.

Featuring - 

- A solitaire game with a challenge and high on replayability
- 40 unique card layout designs to test your skills
- Auto save after each level
- Gorgeous art with four fantasy themed card decks

Take on the task assigned by Eloriel, the Wise. 

The Ancient Tablets of Blessings are lost in the ruins of Faneruel. 

Clear the card formations by making the right choices and the longest chains to restore the tablets back to power. 

Enjoy a distinctive game of solitaire where there are cursed cards to capture and magic wands to help.

What's in this version:

** High res graphics added
** Mute button added

More info:
